info.name: Credit Score API
info.description: API to fetch and update credit score based on PAN number. Implemented using FastAPI and SQLite.

item.name: ‚ûï Add or Update Credit Score
item.description:
**Adds or updates** a credit score record in the database.

- If the PAN already exists, the credit score will be updated.
- If not, a new record will be inserted.

**Request JSON:**
```json
{
  "pan_number": "ABCDE1234F",
  "credit_score": 760
}
```

**Response:**
```json
{
  "status": "success"
}
```
